title: How to Solve CS Xtreme V6 Error 5899 Metadata File Missing

steps.title: This is the picture of the error.
steps.content: This is the picture of the error.

steps.title: Find and enter the location where you have installed CS Xtreme v6.
steps.content: Find and enter the location where you have installed CS Xtreme v6. If you are using windows then it would be something like C:\Program files\Counter.....(depending on the version)

steps.title: Locate and try to run hl.exe or Half-Life.
steps.content: Locate and try to run hl.exe or Half-Life. This depends from which one Half-Life works on your PC.

steps.title: Once In Half-Life, go to Options --> Video --> Renderer Tab and select OpenGL.
steps.content: Once In Half-Life, go to Options --> Video --> Renderer Tab and select OpenGL. Click on Apply.

steps.title: The game will restart.
steps.content: The game will restart. Then quit Half-Life.

steps.title: Now try to run CS Xtreme v6.
steps.content: Now try to run CS Xtreme v6.

steps.title: Click on any one mode (for trial, put the normal mode).
steps.content: Click on any one mode (for trial, put the normal mode).

steps.title: The game will successfully run now.
steps.content: The game will successfully run now.
